channel.title: Nexus 718 run
channel.description:
i get this error when running it
[code][Nexus] Server is loading.. Error: loading: C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\bin\msvcr100.dll Error: loading: C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\bin\server\jvm.dll Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
this is inside the run...
[code]@title Running Nexus @echo off echo [Nexus] Server is loading.. java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -server -Xms2048m -Xmx4096m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause[/code]

item.title: Nexus 718 run
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

Whats this mean? [code]starting…dr
[Launcher] Initing Cache…
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 19
at com.rs.utils.Utils.getItemDefinitionsSize(Utils.java:244)
at com.rs.cache.loaders.ItemEquipIds.init(ItemEquipIds.java:13)
at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:66)
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code] i put the cache in and got this

Read full topic

item.title: Nexus 718 run
item.dc:creator: @AssassinsCRB AssassinsCRB
item.description:
@AssassinsCRB wrote:

Just do a bit of looking around in the your java files. The filepaths are wrong. jvm.dll is in jre7/bin/client and
msvcr100.ddl is in jre7/bin/plugin2. Just change the filepath or copy the files and make that filepath.

Read full topic
